controls.name: control_f4451023-5b20-11eb-8553-f5f20da525b3_
controls.label: LinkedIn Profile
controls.description: Please paste a link like the following: https://www.linkedin.com/company/true-altitude

controls.name: control_a9b014a0-1b9c-11ec-9f55-47977d4fbbfc
controls.label: I have entered correct & valid details
controls.description: Check this box to ensure your profile is processed.

controls.name: control_custom_216139
controls.customCode:
<center>
<button class="btn btn-primary"

        
  @click="function() {
    if ($dgFormTouchSection()) {
      setActiveUserName(rowData.name, rowData.secondName)
      hideBack()
      redirectToApproval()
  	}
	}"        
> 
Submit
</button>
</center>
controls.invisibleCondition: rowData.isApproved == true || rowData.owner != fbUser.uid || rowData.submitPressed != true

controls.name: control_10967c60-2046-11ec-be38-6d48a01c71d3
controls.label: saveButton
controls.customCode:
<center>
<button class="btn btn-primary"

        
  @click="function() {
    if ($dgFormTouchSection()) {
      setActiveUserName(rowData.name, rowData.secondName)
      $setCurrentSubTab('-MPe0oZfJimFYsv9gy53','-MJq8S1suwASZ84EkCd5')

  	}
	}"        
> 
Save
</button>
</center>

controls.name: control_custom_420880
controls.label: approvalMessage1
controls.customCode:
Click the button below to begin the process. You can either:
  • Approve the user (this will send an email and allow the user to access their dashboard)
  • Reject the user (this will add them to the rejected list and they won't be able to access the portal dashboards)
